text:
KEVIN: The day I turned 16,
I got my driver's license
and suddenly I was free.

I could be out in the open
road with nothing but
my own dreams to guide me.

I could let the wind
of adventure blow
back my hair

as the beckoning horizon
pulled me ever onwards.

But instead,
I'm just driving
my little sister

to and from soccer
in my mom's minivan.

Kevin, you're not
just driving me
to soccer.

And on Friday,
you're taking me to
Tina's birthday party.

And then Saturday,
I've got ballet.

I could be out there
making my own destiny,

but instead I'm just
spinning my wheels
and going nowhere.

But if I hold him up
like this, he thinks
he's running super-fast.

(SIGHS) Can't believe
I'm having hamster envy.

Can you fix it?
Can you fix it?
Can you fix it?

No. (SIGHS)
Not really.
But I figured...

The two of you
have been chosen.

We will now
bestow upon you,

Ooh, like
the power to fly?

Okay. I guess
some of them
are imaginable,
but most of them will be...

We're just going to
start bestowing now

I know. This is
awesome, right?

You hear that?
We're gonna be
a brother-sister

This is it.
This is my destiny.

They said the power
of flight, right?

Hm. Maybe I'm not
doing it right?

It's easy.
Just lift your feet.

Where did you get
the outfit?

It's not as easy
as you make it...

Maybe you're not
using your muscles
or something.

I'm using my muscles.
It's just not...
What is going on?

They said the two
of us were supposed
to get powers.

They weren't
even talking
to you.

♪ Who's the improbable duo
That you heard about?

♪ Faster than a scooter
Stronger than metal

♪ Who's the little girl
And her domesticated rodent?

♪ Who's still standing
When you see the dust settle?

♪ If they can do it
Then nobody can

♪ There's also Kevin
In the minivan ♪

an Action News special report.

This is Veronica Hill,
on the scene
at Cliffside Park,

where a kitten
has fallen
in a well.

when this three-ton
boulder fell,
covering the opening.

The boulder came
from the installation
art piece,

of modern life.

The piece is now just
another grim reminder

that balancing
a boulder is often
fraught with peril.

No, there's a runoff

Is that pipe

Oh, no. It's inaccessible,

of a cliff like that.

Only, like,
a small animal
or maybe

Wait, there seems
to be some
action at the pipe.

It's in the side
of a cliff.

I don't see
any other pipes.

Gretel! That's the one.
Now I need you to...

It must be
the right one.

Now I'm gonna need you
to make those specific
turns we talked about...

I'm just gonna go straight.
You know I can punch
through walls, right?

Yes, I know.
But we don't
wanna bust

through a water main
and flood the well.

Yeah, but you've got
me making all these
twists and turns.

How am I supposed
to remember all that?

It's not that complicated.
It's just three rights,
and a left.

Three rights is a left.
I think I should just
go straight.

Gretel, which way
is Hamster going?

Hamster's following
your twisty turny thing.

But I bet I can
beat him there.

Okay, you beat me.
But, look.

And I only just nicked
the water. Ahh!

Gretel! We don't know
if you can breathe
underwater yet!

Hamster and Gretel

but the water
main has burst...

In a related story,
a scrawny,
16-year-old boy

is using his tiny
muscles, not helping
in any way, whatsoever.

Hamster and Gretel
have saved the day.

Gretel, what did you
do when the water
main burst?

Oh, that was easy.
Hamster just drank
all the water.

Wow, he must have
been very thirsty.

Well, at least now
I don't have
to take a shower.

So when do we get
to be real superheroes?

I mean,
when do we get
to fight crime

and whoop up
on the bad guys?

What, you want me
to send you into
a bank robbery? No.

Come on. I bet
I'm indestructible.

We are not testing
that out.

Come on. I've got
to get you to that
mall appearance.

Let's open it up
for some questions
from the audience.

Yeah, this question

My best friend looks
just like you,

And she has
a hamster
named Hamster.

can you sign this
T-shirt for her?

Yes. She's gonna

How do you
know my name?

So Gretel still

I only told you
because I knew you

would never

Right, because
of my disdain

Yeah, I think
we got time.

Kind of random
that you still read
superhero stories

I'm not living one.
Gretel is.

Speaking of which,
she wants to fight
actual crime now.

So? I put that
police scanner
app on your phone.

I know,
but it's just
too dangerous.

I know why
you still like
to come here.

Seriously, dude.
You should just
ask her out.

Yeah, I like
to read those.

(GIGGLES) I figured.
You're buying
it and all.

Hiromi, Is that
a Duck Boyz shirt?

Yeah. I'm gonna watch
the live broadcast

of the concert tonight,
along with everyone
else in town.

I tried to get tickets
but they were sold out.

Well, you know,
my friend Sydney
is their guitarist.

I did actually.
Two of them.

But as luck
would have it,
I can't go.

I was going to give
my cousin Kevin here,
one of them.

(GASPS) Would you like
the other one?

You have a date
with Hiromi.

Bailey was there.
And I had to sign
a T-shirt to myself.

And then
I actually got
to meet her.

She was super nice
and she was even more
like you in person.

You wanna stay over
and watch a movie?

He's at a concert
with a girl.

Should I wait
for her outside or...

Um, sure. But she's got
her own ticket.

All right. She can
already be inside.

You might have
to go inside.

Should I go in, then?
I think I'm gonna go in.

Wait, my police scanner
app is going off.

MAN: This is a message
for the... Wait.

No. That's the light
for the backdrop.

So this here must be
the... Ah! There.

This is a message
for the so-called
"superheroes"

Let's see if you're hero

from my army of evil robots.

and test your mettle
against me,
Professor Exclamation.

I've got an exclamation

Wait, Was that

Do not tell Gretel,
because she's gonna

Uh, too late. I already

on her phone.

Uh, I have to go
to the bathroom.

You want me
to pause it?

Hamster needs to go
to the bathroom, too.

♪ Hamster, Hamster, Hamster
Hamster and Gretel ♪

I'm getting you out of here.
This is too dangerous.

I'm sorry. Are we
interrupting something?

Can you just
give us a minute?

This guy's trying
to take over City Hall.

And that's a job
for the police.

Oh, that's the reason
I chose tonight.

The mayor gave everyone
the night off

to watch the live broadcast
of the Duck Boyz concert.

Frankly, I'm surprised
you're not watching it.

I believe in you.
Can you just get
in the van?

You think I can't take
care of myself?

I mean, I know you've
got all these
powers now, but I...

It's my job
to look out for you.

Aw, Kevin.
You're a great
big brother.

You've been
looking out for me
my whole life.

Me and Hamster...
We've got this.

I'm getting out
of your way.

You're gonna get
your butt kicked.

Yes. By all means,
take your time.

FRED: Hey.
What are you doing?

Nothing. Gretel's out
there whooping up
on the bad guys.

I was trying so hard
to be part of the team,

but I guess
she doesn't
need me anymore.

Well, all baby
birds leave the nest,
blah, blah, blah.

You know, the concert's
starting soon, right?

(LAUGHS) The robots
were just a distraction
so I could capture you.

This energy cage
is unbreakable even
by the two of you.

It draws power
directly from the
city's power grid.

So as long as this
city has power,
you are my prisoners.

Think of something.
You are the brains.

I'm the brains?
I am part of the team.

That means I've got
to think of something.

MAN: (ON TV) That's right,
ladies and gentlemen.

Tonight is
the television event
you've been waiting for.

The Duck Boyz,
live in concert.

One night only.
Until they fly...

Fred, you're friends
with the Duck Boyz
guitarist, right?

Okay, they're gonna let you
make the announcement
right after this song,

but you won't have
a lot of time.

Do you know what
you're going to say?

Yeah, I got it
all written down.

All right.
You're good to go.

Hiromi's out there.
How am I gonna
explain this?

Now you're just
another Duck boy.

If you're watching at home,
there's something we...

The Duck Boyz
want you to do.

Just to overload the grid ♪

You're not getting away
with this, you know?

Kevin will think of something,
and then you'll be in trouble.

So, let me get this straight.

be worried about

Is the one with

whatsoever.

Because big brothers

Yep, even when

Oh, whatever.
What are you

The only thing special

And I've got

In a trap that feeds

Yes, I heard.

But you know

And that shuts off

You really are

And you are
a super,
little sister.

Could we get on

This is not
as comfortable

And you have
a date to get back to.

They ended
early because

Yeah. I'm sorry
I was late.
I was just...

I was taking care

Hey, you missed
their new single.

You have no
sense of romance.

If anyone needs me,
I'll be in my wheel.

We've got no water
pressure, Chief.

It's because of that
broken water main

It's a good thing
it's been evacuated

because it would take

fire out now.

Look, Chief.

Okay, the water pressure
is too low.

You know we can go

'Cause I fixed it

I was just about

Well, the first

And why are your

He's a sweat piece,

She's waiting for you

that Hamster and

That's when you

Eh, well.
